title: Game cashing as launching client and won't let me reconnect
body:
I was in que to a ranked game and all picks had been done. As the game launched, it instantly crashed asking me to reconnect. Trying many times to reconnect, it just would not. This also happened in a normals game. I've lost 30+ lp as well as been putting in to 20 minute ban waits. I tried to play on a friends computer and the same thing happened.

Please help, at least give my lp back and take away the ban limits. Really do not want make a new account for my brother can play on his account on the same computer with no problem.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble connecting to our game server, and placing you back to the reconnect screen.  Our [Troubleshooting Connections ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide will provide some steps to help you get back in the game.  I also recommend testing this in custom games so you don't incur further penalties.
